chunks.text: The platform includes user authentication, real-time analytics, and API integrations. It also supports role-based permissions, data export options, and an intuitive dashboard. New updates include performance improvements, accessibility enhancements, and AI-powered search features.

Refunds may be requested within 30 days of purchase. Customers must provide proof of purchase and submit the refund request through the official support portal. Refunds are typically processed within 7 business days. Digital products are non-returnable but may qualify for refund eligibility depending on usage.
